speaker: President.
english: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0399/2007 ) by Mr Costa, on behalf of the Committee on Transport and Tourism, on a renewed EU tourism policy: towards a stronger partnership for European tourism [ 2006/2129(INI) ].
original: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0399/2007 ) by Mr Costa, on behalf of the Committee on Transport and Tourism, on a renewed EU tourism policy: towards a stronger partnership for European tourism [ 2006/2129(INI) ].
agenda_item: A renewed EU tourism policy: towards a stronger partnership for European tourism (debate)
